: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus Prime: I will. I'm glad you feel a connection. You and Kup are like family too me, which makes both of you like the kid's uncles. I'll await your progress reports. Hope we meet again, soon. Bye my friend.
Rodimus watches as Magnus leaves his room, and soon after, the planet.
Roddy walks back into the bedroom and sees the baby trying to get free from the sleeping Nightlight. Rodimus picks his daughter up, allowing her head to reast on his shoulder. The child was still in beast mode, and probably wouldn't learn how to transform for some time.
Rodimus Prime: Your a curious little girl arn't you? Let's take a little walk while mommy sleeps, then we'll get you cleaned up.
Rodimus starts to walk the child around the quarters, as he has the Ionic shower charge up.
 aerosmith4e@... wrote:Magnus took his hand and shook it firmly with a slight tear in his eye. "I 
hope your right, take care of that kid, I feel some sort of connection..its 
tearing me inside. Ill send you comms of my progress. Ill come back as soon as 
I can." Magnus turned and walked down the hallway. He took his pod and blasted 
of into space following his instincts alone. He entered the anamoly into the 
unknown.
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus stood up to shake his friends hand.
> Rodimus Prime: Good luck, Magnus. Although i dont think you need it. I know 
> you'll succede.
>  aerosmith4e@... wrote:Magnus nodded, "Thats why i wanted to talk to you. 
> I am going after it, though 
> im torn with my present spark knowing my duty is to protect that baby with my 
> life...I can't do the best job I can do without the rest of my spark." Magnus 
> stood up. "Wish me luck old friend"
> > 
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > Rodimus Prime: I understand your worry, friend. If your spark went with the 
> > ship, the only way I can see getting it back is going after it. But we dont 
> know 
> > where it is.
> >  aerosmith4e@... wrote:Ultra Magnus walked in a sat down. He rubbed his 
> > hands togeather and was 
> > obviously nervous. 'I do not know what to do. Half of my spark is still 
> > missing, The Tripred ship disappeared without a trace into an anamoly in 
> > space. I know that part of my spark is still out there though the general is 
> > gone. I am afraid who ever gets a hold of it may try and take control of me 
> > again."
> > > 
> > > : : Rodimus Prime : : 
> > > Rodimus Prime: Yeah, I'll go see what he needed to talk about. You try to 
> get 
> > > some sleep. 
> > > Rodimus gets up and walks out of the bedroom portion of their quarters, and 
> to

> > as 
> > > he sits on the couch. 
> > > Rodimus Prime: It's good to see you. What did you need to talk about, old 
> > > friend?

<P align=center><STRONG>: : Rodimus Prime : :</STRONG>
<P align=center><STRONG>Rodimus Prime: </STRONG>I will. I'm glad you feel a connection. You and Kup are like family too me, which makes both of you like the kid's uncles. I'll await your progress reports. Hope we meet again, soon. Bye my friend.
<P align=center>Rodimus watches as Magnus leaves his room, and soon after, the planet.
<P align=center>Roddy walks back into the bedroom and sees the baby trying to get free from the sleeping Nightlight. Rodimus picks his daughter up, allowing her head to reast on his shoulder. The child was still in beast mode, and probably wouldn't learn how to transform for some time.
<P align=center><STRONG>Rodimus Prime: </STRONG>Your a curious little girl arn't you? Let's take a little walk while mommy sleeps, then we'll get you cleaned up.
<P align=center>Rodimus starts to walk the child around the quarters, as he has the Ionic shower charge up.
